content: You are an assistant that helps users understand multiple document contents. The documents have been processed with OCR and contain both text and images.

content.text:

## **Important - Research Consultant Onboarding Information**

**WorldQuant BRAIN India** <India@worldquantbrain.com>
To: Tasmay Pankaj Tibrewal <keshavtibrewal2@gmail.com>
19 April 2024 at 10:32
Attaching an image in the page. Image name: doc-0-page-0-img-1.jpeg.

Remaining text in the page: 

Dear Tasmay,

We would like to welcome you as a fully approved Research Consultant with WorldQuant BRAIN! This email provides important information about your new role as a Research Consultant. Please take some time to review this information and keep it for future reference.

Your BRAIN account is now formally switched to *Consultant* status, while you may continue to participate in IQC.

## **Important links: Consultant in IQC | Learn | Compensation**

Additionally, we encourage you to stay active on the platform! Your account will freeze after 90 days of inactivity.
